attacks.name: Soft Slap
attacks.desc: A soft attack with low power and moderate accuracy.

attacks.name: High Kick
attacks.desc: An inaccurate attack with decent power.

attacks.name: Stoic
attacks.desc: The user summons inner strength to boost defense by 25%.

attacks.name: Shoulder Bash
attacks.desc: An aggressive attack with decent power and accuracy.

attacks.name: Jaw Breaker
attacks.desc: A brutal but inaccurate attack. It has a high crit ratio.

attacks.name: Flurry Fist
attacks.desc: A highly inaccurate, but powerful barrage of speedy punches.

attacks.name: Precision Wing
attacks.desc: The user sheds and hurls wings at the opponent. This attack does not miss.

attacks.name: Draco Energy
attacks.desc: A mystical summoning of draconic energy, sharply boosting the user's attack and speed stats.

attacks.name: Dark Energy
attacks.desc: The user summons demonic spirits to drastically boost its attack stat.

attacks.name: Druid Energy
attacks.desc: The user draws power from nature, sharply raising HP and defense.

attacks.name: Tornado Kick
attacks.desc: The user increases agility to swiftly kick the enemy. The user's speed increases if it lands.

attacks.name: Hyper Impact
attacks.desc: The user charges at the foe using every bit of its power, dealing insane damage. It must rest on the next turn.
